Charlotte Leib

Juncus canadensis

Published on Wednesday, March 27, 2024

Juncus canadensis, or Black grass, was one of the most prized grasses for cattle feed in the colonial era and remained so until the early 1920’s…

Above: Juncus canadensis, (Black grass)
